feed.title: Fail2Ban Releases
feed.subtitle: Self-hosted software releases generated by selfh.st

entry.title: New release for Fail2Ban: 0.10.6 (2020/11/23) - just-what-the-doctor-ordered
entry.content:
ver. 0.10.6 (2020/11/23) - just what the doctor ordered

Last (due to v.0.11) release of 0.10th fail2ban-version, filter and action updates, etc. See the ChangeLog for more information.

It also includes debian package, built without a test suite (fail2ban-testcases, fail2ban.test python module).

entry.title: New release for Fail2Ban: 0.11.2 (2020/11/23) - heal-the-world-with-security-tools
entry.content:
ver. 0.11.2 (2020/11/23) - heal the world with security tools

New major version of fail2ban with increased stability, filter and action updates, etc. See the ChangeLog for more information.

It also includes debian package, built without a test suite (fail2ban-testcases, fail2ban.test python module).

entry.title: New release for Fail2Ban: 1.0.1 (2022/09/27) - energy-equals-mass-times-the-speed-of-light-squared
entry.content:
ver. 1.0.1 (2022/09/27) - energy equals mass times the speed of light squared

New major version of fail2ban with increased performance, stability, filter and action updates, etc. See the ChangeLog for more information.

It also includes debian package, built without a test suite (fail2ban-testcases, fail2ban.test python module) for python 3.

entry.title: New release for Fail2Ban: 1.0.2 (2022/11/09) - finally-war-game-test-tape-not-a-nuclear-alarm
entry.content:
ver. 1.0.2 (2022/11/09) - finally war game test tape not a nuclear alarm

Update of major version of fail2ban with primary target to fix a dovecot-filter regression #3370. See the ChangeLog for more information.

It also includes debian package, built without a test suite (fail2ban-testcases, fail2ban.test python module) for python 3.

entry.title: New release for Fail2Ban: 1.1.0 (2024/04/25) - object-found--norad-59479-cospar-2024-069a--altitude-36267km
entry.content:
ver. 1.1.0 (2024/04/25) - object found: norad:59479, cospar:2024-069a, altitude: 36267km

Update of major version of fail2ban with primary target to provide python 3.12/3.13 compatibility, issue #3487. See the ChangeLog for more information.

It also includes debian package, built without a test suite (fail2ban-testcases, fail2ban.test python module).
